titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2829) to reauthorize the Office of National Drug Control Policy Act.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2829) to reauthorize the Office of National Drug Control Policy Act.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-387, by Mr. Sessions.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2829 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 154.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 713.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 195 (Roll no. 33).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2829) to reauthorize the Office of National Drug Control Policy Act.
